taxon_identification.other_info_on_name: [ Raillardia , orthographic variant of generic name Railliardia , and Latin - ella , diminutive]

bio:treatment.discussion: Raillardella represents an early diverging lineage of tarweeds (Carlquist et al. 2003); putatively ancestral morphologic, ecologic, and chromosomal characteristics are shared with Arnica, the sister group of Madiinae (B. G. Baldwin and B. L. Wessa 2000). Two species that have been included in Raillardella are more closely related to other genera (e.g., Madia, B. G. Baldwin 1996) and are here treated as Anisocarpus scabridus and Carlquistia muirii.
